languages.text: {n}Он горько усмехается, и на повязке со святыми рукописями расцветают багровые пятна.{/n} "Аделина была моим ритуальным защитником, и она же оказалась главной слабостью. Когда астропаты начали теряться в безумном потоке чужих мыслей, я испугался за нее. Замешкался, пожалел... и утратил контроль. Было бы правильно пожертвовать ей, а я... не смог. Я всегда был к ней неравнодушен, моей гениальной любимице".

traits.locale_text: "Так всё и началось. Ослепленный гордыней, я собственноручно подписал приговор целому хору не только исключительных псайкеров, но и прекрасных, достойных слуг Империума". {n}Тело хормейстера на пару секунд содрагается от спазмов.{/n} "Где-то на середине ритуала мы начали нести потери. Аделина, поддерживающая оградительный обряд, умоляла меня остановиться, пока не стало слишком поздно. Но я был глух к голосу разума, слишком опьянен перспективами в досягаемости вытянутой руки и приказал ей не останавливаться. И очень скоро я за это поплатился. Моя часть сделки была выполнена. Но пламя амбиций погибло в пожаре, забравшем жизни моего хора".

languages.text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."

Я всегда был к ней неравнодушен, моей гениальной любимице".

languages.text: {n}Se ríe con amargura y su venda de manuscritos sagrados se tiñe de escarlata.{/n} «Adeline era mi protectora en el ritual, pero se convirtió en mi mayor debilidad. Cuando la corriente demencial de pensamientos empezó a desorientar a mis Astrópatas, tuve miedo por ella. Dudé, intenté salvarla... y perdí el control. Lo correcto habría sido sacrificarla, pero... no pude. Siempre le había tenido un cariño especial. Su talento la había convertido en mi favorita».
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se ríe con amargura y su venda de manuscritos sagrados se tiñe de escarlata.{/n} «Adeline era mi protectora en el ritual, pero se convirtió en mi mayor debilidad. Cuando la corriente demencial de pensamientos empezó a desorientar a mis Astrópatas, tuve miedo por ella. Dudé, intenté salvarla... y perdí el control. Lo correcto habría sido sacrificarla, pero... no pude. Siempre le había tenido un cariño especial. Su talento la había convertido en mi favorita».

languages.text: {n}男は苦笑いを浮かべ、神聖な写本の目隠しに緋色の染みを咲かせた。{/n}「アデリーンは私の儀式の保安役だったが、やがて一番の弱みになった。他の者の狂った思考が流れて、うちの感応通信官たちの動きを乱し始めたとき、私はアデリーンのことが心配だった。私は迷ってしまい、彼女を助けたい気持ちが生まれ…そしてコントロールを失ったのだ。彼女を犠牲にすることが正しい行動だったが…できなかった。ずっと彼女に好意を抱いていたんだ。あの才能を気に入っていた」
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は苦笑いを浮かべ、神聖な写本の目隠しに緋色の染みを咲かせた。{/n}「アデリーンは私の儀式の保安役だったが、やがて一番の弱みになった。他の者の狂った思考が流れて、うちの感応通信官たちの動きを乱し始めたとき、私はアデリーンのことが心配だった。私は迷ってしまい、彼女を助けたい気持ちが生まれ…そしてコントロールを失ったのだ。彼女を犠牲にすることが正しい行動だったが…できなかった。ずっと彼女に好意を抱いていたんだ。あの才能を気に入っていた」

languages.text: {n}他苦涩地笑了起来，鲜红色的污渍在神圣手稿制成的眼罩上不断绽开。{/n}“仪式期间，艾德琳负责保护我的安全，可她却成为了我最大的弱点。当其他人疯狂的想法袭来，我的星语者们开始迷失方向时，我担心起了她的安全。我犹豫了，我想要救她一命……于是我失去了控制。当初，正确的做法是把她牺牲掉，但我……我做不到。她始终是我的软肋，她才华横溢，是我最偏爱的学徒。”
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."

traits.locale_text: {n}他苦涩地笑了起来，鲜红色的污渍在神圣手稿制成的眼罩上不断绽开。{/n}“仪式期间，艾德琳负责保护我的安全，可她却成为了我最大的弱点。当其他人疯狂的想法袭来，我的星语者们开始迷失方向时，我担心起了她的安全。我犹豫了，我想要救她一命……于是我失去了控制。当初，正确的做法是把她牺牲掉，但我……我做不到。她始终是我的软肋，她才华横溢，是我最偏爱的学徒。”

languages.text: {n}Er lacht verbittert auf, und rote Flecken erblühen auf seiner Augenbinde aus heiligen Manuskripten.{/n} "Adeline war meine Ritualwächterin, wurde dann aber zu meiner größten Schwachstelle. Als der wahnsinnige Strom der Gedanken anderer anfing, meinen Astropathen die Orientierung zu rauben, bekam ich Angst um Adeline. Ich zögerte, wollte sie verschonen ... und verlor die Kontrolle. Ich hätte sie opfern müssen, doch ... Ich konnte es nicht. Ich hatte schon immer eine Schwäche für sie gehabt. Ihre Genialität hatte sie zu meiner Lieblingsschülerin gemacht."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er lacht verbittert auf, und rote Flecken erblühen auf seiner Augenbinde aus heiligen Manuskripten.{/n} "Adeline war meine Ritualwächterin, wurde dann aber zu meiner größten Schwachstelle. Als der wahnsinnige Strom der Gedanken anderer anfing, meinen Astropathen die Orientierung zu rauben, bekam ich Angst um Adeline. Ich zögerte, wollte sie verschonen ... und verlor die Kontrolle. Ich hätte sie opfern müssen, doch ... Ich konnte es nicht. Ich hatte schon immer eine Schwäche für sie gehabt. Ihre Genialität hatte sie zu meiner Lieblingsschülerin gemacht."

languages.text: {n}Il pousse un ricanement amer, et des corolles écarlates s'épanouissent sur son bandeau recouvert d'inscriptions sacrées.{/n} « Adeline, ma protectrice rituelle attitrée, s'est révélée ma plus grande vulnérabilité. Quand le flot démentiel des tierces pensées a commencé à désorienter mes astropathes, j'ai eu peur pour sa sécurité. J'ai hésité, j'ai cherché à l'épargner et... j'ai perdu le contrôle. La meilleure chose à faire aurait été de la sacrifier, mais... c'était au-dessus de mes forces. J'avais toujours eu un faible pour ma protégée. Son génie était tel qu'elle était devenue ma favorite. »
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il pousse un ricanement amer, et des corolles écarlates s'épanouissent sur son bandeau recouvert d'inscriptions sacrées.{/n} « Adeline, ma protectrice rituelle attitrée, s'est révélée ma plus grande vulnérabilité. Quand le flot démentiel des tierces pensées a commencé à désorienter mes astropathes, j'ai eu peur pour sa sécurité. J'ai hésité, j'ai cherché à l'épargner et... j'ai perdu le contrôle. La meilleure chose à faire aurait été de la sacrifier, mais... c'était au-dessus de mes forces. J'avais toujours eu un faible pour ma protégée. Son génie était tel qu'elle était devenue ma favorite. »

languages.text: {n}Acıyla dolu bir şekilde kıkırdıyor. Kutsal el yazmalarından yapılma göz bağından kan kızılı lekeler doğuyor.{/n} "Adeline, ayinimin koruyuculuğu yapıyordu fakat sonunda en büyük zaafıma dönüştü. Diğerlerinin düşünceleri, zihinlerine çılgıncasına akın ettikleri Astropatlarımın kafalarını karıştırmaya başladı. Ben de onun için endişelendim. Tereddüt ettim, onu kurtarmak istedim ve... Kontrolü yitirdim. Doğru olan onu feda etmekti ama... Yapamadım. Ona karşı her daim zaafım vardı. Dehasından dolayı gözdem hâline gelmişti."
languages.original_text: {n}He chuckles bitterly, and scarlet stains bloom on his blindfold made of sacred manuscripts.{/n} "Adeline was my ritual protector, only to become my greatest vulnerability. When the mad stream of other people's thoughts started to disorient my Astropaths, I became frightened for her. I hesitated, I wanted to spare her... and I lost control. The right thing to do would have been to sacrifice her, but... I couldn't. I had always had a soft spot for her. Her genius had made her my favourite."
